description: Apart from being a programmer and a student, I mostly enjoy doing and watching various sports, especially basketball, athletics, swimming and football. Among basketball leagues I consider NBA to be most fascinating and my two favorite players are [Russel Westbrook](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w3l3txhX0L4) and [Kevin Durant](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-f6TnC0xFPY) . As a former sprinter I am still shocked by Wayde van Niekerk's [world record](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xG91krXuxyw).

As for my other interests I am keen on travelling (most beautiful city - Porto, Portugal, most astonishing view - Tatev, Armenia, best beach - Tangalle, Sri Lanka). Aside from that, in my free time I like visiting escape rooms and reading books (particularly fantasy and history). However my most beloved activity is going to rock concerts (I've been to around 40 already).
